r.s: An SQL Builder, Object Interface to Database Tables
r.d: DataObject performs 2 tasks: 1. Builds SQL statements based on the objects vars and the builder methods. 2. acts as a datastore for a table row. The core class is designed to be extended for each of your tables so that you put the data logic inside the data classes. included is a Generator to make your configuration files and your base classes. nd
r.n:
Minor bug fix release
Bug Fixes: #2088 - class_prefix may be left out. #------ php4.2 compatibility should work as advertised in last realease #------ Generator didnt have DB loaded due to lazy load changes.
